channel.title: Working on a little script
channel.description:
And i'm having some odd troubles :\
all i'm doing is trying to declare a boolean and have it react to it but i'm getting odd reactions(i set the 2nd one to true but it does 2 and five i don't know) the bell just rang so i have to do this fast
Thats the whole thing, i don't need critisim on the entire script just the FlipSlotCard procedure near the bottom :P
Eventually i want to make it play solitare, and don't tell me if theres another script that already does this...cause then i'll loose motivation :P
Its int he basic stages atm i've got it to recgignize the cards and now i'm just trying to have a procedure in place that i can call on later(FlipSlotCard;)
If you open up the Solitare game that comes with XP thats the one i'm using, but when i set FlipCardSlotTwo to true, it trys to flip 2 and five :\ i havn't a clue why

item.title: Working on a little script
item.dc:creator: @Dgc2002 Dgc2002
item.description:
@Dgc2002 wrote:

Thank you, i ended up getting help on your website actually

Read full topic

item.title: Working on a little script
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

There you go, you forgot the “end;” of the if statement for flipping the second card and you forgot the begin of the if statement for flipping the fifth card.

Read full topic
